name: Armored Advance
simpleDescription: Deal damage to empower your heals and shields

passives.name: Plating
passives.effects: Reduces all incoming {{tip|basic damage}} by 10% (''excluding from [[turret]] attacks'').

passives.name: Noxian Endurance
passives.effects: Taking {{as|physical damage}} from champions grants you a {{tip|shield}} that absorbs {{pp|100 to 200|color=pd}} {{as|(+ 8% '''bonus''' health)}} {{as|physical damage}} for 5 seconds.
